body_html:
@apaszke Made changes as the review comments. Keeping a placeholder variable gave us around 500 millisecond gain on 500 x 1000 x 400 cpu tensor
B/w, tensor.new(shape).zero_() or torch.zero(shape).type_as(tensor) is faster? or it doesn't really matter?

@apaszke Made changes as the review comments. Keeping a placeholder variable gave us around 500 millisecond gain on 500 x 1000 x 400 cpu tensor
B/w, tensor.new(shape).zero_() or torch.zero(shape).type_as(tensor) is faster? or it doesn't really matter?
body:
@apaszke Made changes as the review comments. Keeping a placeholder variable gave us around 500 millisecond gain on 500 x 1000 x 400 cpu tensor
B/w, ``tensor.new(shape).zero_()`` or ``torch.zero(shape).type_as(tensor)`` is faster? or it doesn't really matter?
